title: I got ghosted again.
body: We were in the middle of a conversation on Tinder Clone #561489 about how she's always wanted to go trap shooting which I'm fully equipped to treat a guest to, who our favorite Star Trek captains are, and how much we love dogs, when suddenly the conversation disappears. Unmatched. I don't even know why. That's how every conversation I've had on any Tinder clone has ended. Why do people do this? It's so unnecessarily hurtful.
